title: Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expos with `expodiff`
text: expodiff package provides tools exploring differences World Expos Specialised Expos. includes interactive Shiny app data sets can used analysis visualization. vignette, : 1. Walk install launch Shiny app. 2. Explore data sets included package. 3. Demonstrate visualize analyze data beyond app.

title: Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expos with `expodiff`
text: Install package directly GitHub: Load package:

title: Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expos with `expodiff`
text: main feature expodiff Shiny app. app provides interactive visualizations compare World Expos Specialised Expos. Launch app using: launched, app provides following interactive plots: Average Attending Countries: Visualizes number countries attending expos time. Area Size vs. Visitors: Explores relationship area size number visitors. Top Themes: Displays popular expo themes based frequency. Economic Factors: Shows summary table comparing World Specialised expos.

title: Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expos with `expodiff`
text: Beyond Shiny app, package includes combined dataset (combined_data) allows perform analyses. can access data set follows: Inspect data set: data set contains three components: top_words_world: Top 10 themes World Expos. top_words_spec: Top 10 themes Specialised Expos. summary_combined: summary economic factors like cost, visitors, attending countries.

title: Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expos with `expodiff`
text: Example visualize average number attending countries time expo types: plot shows difference average number attending countries World Expos Specialised Expos time.
code: library(tidyverse) library(ggplot2)  avg_attend_combined <- combined_data$summary_combined  ggplot(combined_data$summary_combined, aes(x = mean_cost, y = mean_visitors, color = expo_type)) +   geom_point(size = 3) +   theme_minimal() +   labs(title = "Mean Cost vs Mean Visitors", x = "Mean Cost", y = "Mean Visitors")

title: Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expos with `expodiff`
text: Instead manually creating comparison economic factors expo types, use get_econ_sum() function retrieve economic summary expo type. table highlights differences economic scale World Specialised Expos, providing insights costs attendance.
code: library(tidyverse)  # Retrieve economic summaries for both expo types world_econ <- get_econ_sum("World Expo") spec_econ <- get_econ_sum("Specialised Expo")  # Combine summaries into a single dataset for comparison econ_data <- rbind(   world_econ %>% mutate(expo_type = "World Expo"),   spec_econ %>% mutate(expo_type = "Specialised Expo") )  econ_data ## # A tibble: 2 × 7 ##   expo_type        mean_cost median_cost mean_visitors median_visitors ##   <chr>                <dbl>       <dbl>         <dbl>           <dbl> ## 1 World Expo            558.          40          21.8            15.5 ## 2 Specialised Expo      577.         350          11.3             8.2 ## # ℹ 2 more variables: mean_attending_countries <dbl>, ## #   median_attending_countries <dbl>

title: Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expos with `expodiff`
text: get_top_themes function allows retrieve top themes World Specialised Expos:
code: # Get top themes for World Expo world_themes <- get_top_themes("World Expo") print(world_themes) ## # A tibble: 13 × 3 ##    category   word            n ##    <chr>      <chr>       <int> ##  1 World Expo arts            8 ##  2 World Expo industry        8 ##  3 World Expo life            4 ##  4 World Expo agriculture     3 ##  5 World Expo industrial      3 ##  6 World Expo nations         3 ##  7 World Expo products        3 ##  8 World Expo world           3 ##  9 World Expo art             2 ## 10 World Expo discovery       2 ## 11 World Expo modern          2 ## 12 World Expo peace           2 ## 13 World Expo technology      2 # Get top themes for Specialised Expo spec_themes <- get_top_themes("Specialised Expo") print(spec_themes) ## # A tibble: 10 × 3 ##    category         word            n ##    <chr>            <chr>       <int> ##  1 Specialised Expo world           6 ##  2 Specialised Expo water           3 ##  3 Specialised Expo development     2 ##  4 Specialised Expo energy          2 ##  5 Specialised Expo environment     2 ##  6 Specialised Expo fresh           2 ##  7 Specialised Expo future          2 ##  8 Specialised Expo sea             2 ##  9 Specialised Expo sport           2 ## 10 Specialised Expo technology      2

title: Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expos with `expodiff`
text: expodiff package offers robust toolset exploring visualizing data World Specialised Expos, whether using Shiny app interactive data exploration working directly data sets analysis.

what: Package for Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expo data
title: Package for Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expo data
text: goal expodiff provide interactive exploration World Expos Specialised Expos data, allowing users visualize compare key metrics like attending countries, area size, visitors, economic factors. package includes Shiny app enables dynamic data exploration interactive visualizations.

title: Package for Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expo data
text: can install development version expodiff GitHub :

title: Package for Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expo data
text: basic example shows load library expodiff launch shiny App: Shiny app provides various visualizations comparisons, : Average attending countries time World Specialised Expos. Correlation area size number visitors. Top themes Expos, ranked based frequency. Economic factors scale comparisons different types Expos.
code: # Load library  library(expodiff) # Launch Shiny App  launch_expodiff()

title: Package for Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expo data
text: data behind expodiff package includes: World Expo Specialised Expo data: Covering attending countries, visitors, cost, area, themes. Interactive visualizations: Using plotly ggplot2 create responsive dynamic charts. Economic analysis: summary table comparing cost, visitors, attending countries World Expos Specialised Expos.

title: Package for Exploring World Expos and Specialised Expo data
text: can summarize built-data sets:
code: # Load the combined dataset data("combined_data", package = "expodiff")  # Example summary of attending countries summary(combined_data$summary_combined) #>   expo_type           mean_cost      median_cost    mean_visitors   #>  Length:2           Min.   :557.9   Min.   : 40.0   Min.   :11.31   #>  Class :character   1st Qu.:562.6   1st Qu.:117.5   1st Qu.:13.92   #>  Mode  :character   Median :567.3   Median :195.0   Median :16.53   #>                     Mean   :567.3   Mean   :195.0   Mean   :16.53   #>                     3rd Qu.:572.0   3rd Qu.:272.5   3rd Qu.:19.15   #>                     Max.   :576.7   Max.   :350.0   Max.   :21.76   #>  median_visitors mean_attending_countries median_attending_countries #>  Min.   : 8.20   Min.   :36.86            Min.   :23.00              #>  1st Qu.:10.03   1st Qu.:39.12            1st Qu.:25.75              #>  Median :11.85   Median :41.38            Median :28.50              #>  Mean   :11.85   Mean   :41.38            Mean   :28.50              #>  3rd Qu.:13.68   3rd Qu.:43.63            3rd Qu.:31.25              #>  Max.   :15.50   Max.   :45.89            Max.   :34.00
